reviewText:
Daisy arrives in L.A. full of dreams and aspirations, but when her boyfriend dumps her unceremoniously, she ends up stripping to make a living. Soon, her ambition takes over as she unites her fellow strippers and begins a business that caters to a very wealthy and not so discreet clientele.

Unfortunately, things get complicated when she falls for Los Angeles police Det. Collin from the Vice Squad.
God aweful, disgusting, putred, horrible, ugly, make me barf fake breasts

This is an erotic movie without erotic scenes, what a nonsense.
All the erotic Scenes are cutted or completely deleted.
I don't understand this. Try to get the unrated version!
Quality: Really bad, you can see only red and green colors.
Incredible, a false pressing.

I should have known that when the seller said this movie was a former rental that this movie was going to be cut to pieces. its only a little bit over an hour and the sex scenes are hardly worth it being cut as they are. Why? would you cut a movie that's only simulated sex anyway.
